title: Perma banned for what?
body: Excuse me RIOT games i would like to know why should a player like me get banned, for being toxic when i get a double jungle in my team in a ranked match when they intentionally feed me and blame me for splitpushing.

replies.body:
1) This is the italian forum. Here we just speak italian, pizza and spaghetti.

2) Nobody here can revoke your ban. Nobody.

3) Did you flame? Yes? Then yes, you deserve a ban.
